darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

keensenses.name: Keen Senses
keensenses.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

elfweapons.name: Elf Weapon Training
elfweapons.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

cantrip.name: Cantrip
cantrip.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.
